Mohamed Chabâa ( Arabic ; 1935–2013) bụ onye Morocco na-ese ihe. Ọ bụ onye otu Casablanca School na onye ndu nke nka ọgbara ọhụrụ na ihe ọgbara ọhụrụ na Global South. Ụzọ ya dị iche iche maka nka ghọrọ ihe nnọchianya nke ọdịbendị nke e mere na Morocco n'oge na-esote njedebe nke French Protectorate.

A mụrụ ya na Tangier n'afọ 1935. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na School of Fine Arts nke Tetuan Site na 1962 ruo 1964, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Accademia di Belle Arti di Roma N'afọ 1966, e goro ya dị ka prọfesọ na School of Fine Arts nke Casablanca na National School of Architecture na Rabat. Ọ na-emegide nhazi nke nka Morocco dị ka "akụkọ ifo" ma ọ bụ nka na-enweghị isi, ma bipụta echiche ya na magazin edemede Anfas Ya na ndị enyi ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya Mohamed Melehi, Farid Belkahia, na ndị ọzọ, Chabâa sonyeere n'òtù ọgbara ọhụrụ a maara dị ka Casablanca School.
